title: Amazon secures rockets for broadband project
description: It has booked 83 launches for its low earth orbit satellite internet system Project Kuiper.

title: Instagram: Presenter Rachel Riley received series of porn messages
description: The Center for Countering Digital Hate found abuse in the Instagram DMs of five high-profile females.

title: Twitter confirms it is working on an edit button
description: It comes after new board member Elon Musk asked his followers if they wanted the feature.
